other_tests.findings: Focal hyperperfusion during stroke-like episodes and hypoperfusion afterwards.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Reduction in perfusion in previously hyperperfused area two months after initial studies.

other_tests.findings: Dilation of cortical arteries and capillary blush without occlusive lesions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Relative hypovascularization identified two months after the initial studies.

other_tests.findings: Mutation from A to G at nucleotide pair 3243.
